DOC.brief_title: Dexmedetomidine Versus Propofol Prolonged Sedation Critically Ill Trauma Surgical Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Open-label , single-center prospective study . Setting : Trauma/Surgical Intensive Care Unit ( TSICU ) Level I academic trauma center . Patients : Patients 18 year age old require mechanical ventilation admit TSICU Interventions : Patients randomly assign base unit bed location receive dexmedetomidine propofol sedation .
DOC.criteria: Patients include study 18 year age old , mechanically ventilate , place institutional sedation protocol , expect require sedation last 24 hour randomization , admit TSICU follow Trauma/Surgical Service . Patients exclude follow : 72 hour great since sedation protocol initiation , treatment per institutional traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) protocol , concomitant continuous infusion neuromuscular blocking agent , heart rate le 50 beat per minute , mean arterial pressure le 55 mmHg despite fluid resuscitation vasopressor , use alpha2 agonist within 24 hour randomization .
